snippet: Medpartners Inc. reached a settlement with California regulators that allows it to sell its physician-practice-management operations in the state.    Medpartners announced the agreement after trading closed Wednesday. Three months earlier, Califor...
lead_paragraph: Medpartners Inc. reached a settlement with California regulators that allows it to sell its physician-practice-management operations in the state. Medpartners announced the agreement after trading closed Wednesday. Three months earlier, California regulators seized its operations in the state and placed it under Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection because Medpartners did not have enough cash to pay new claims.
abstract: Medpartners Inc reaches settlement with California regulators that allows it to sell its physician-practice-management operations in that state; California regulators seized Medpartners' operations in state three months ago and placed it under Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection because it did not have enough cash to pay new claims (M)

headline.main: Medpartners in Accord on California Sale
